member.name: T:Ninject.Extensions.Factory.Factory.IInstanceResolver
member.summary: Resolves instances from the kernel.

member.name: M:Ninject.Extensions.Factory.Factory.IInstanceResolver.Get(System.Type,System.String,System.Func{Ninject.Planning.Bindings.IBindingMetadata,System.Boolean},Ninject.Parameters.IParameter[],System.Boolean)
member.summary: Gets an instance of the specified type.
member.param: The name of the binding to use. If null the name is not used.
The constraint for the bindings. If null the constraint is not used.
if set to true the request falls back to requesting instances without name or constraint if no one can received otherwise.
member.returns: An instance of the specified type.

if set to true the request falls back to requesting instances without name or constraint if no one can received otherwise.

member.name: T:Ninject.Extensions.Factory.StandardInstanceProvider
member.summary: The standard implementation of the instance provider

member.name: M:Ninject.Extensions.Factory.StandardInstanceProvider.GetInstance(Ninject.Extensions.Factory.Factory.IInstanceResolver,System.Reflection.MethodInfo,System.Object[])
member.summary: Gets an instance for the specified method and arguments.
member.param: The method info of the method that was called on the factory.
The arguments that were passed to the factory.
member.returns: The newly created instance.

member.name: M:Ninject.Extensions.Factory.StandardInstanceProvider.GetConstraint(System.Reflection.MethodInfo,System.Object[])
member.summary: Gets the constraint for the specified method and arguments.
member.param: The method info of the method that was called on the factory.
The arguments passed to the factory.
member.returns: The constraint that shall be used to receive an instance. Null if no constraint shall be used.

member.name: M:Ninject.Extensions.Factory.StandardInstanceProvider.GetType(System.Reflection.MethodInfo,System.Object[])
member.summary: Gets the type that shall be created for the specified method and arguments.
member.param: The method info of the method that was called on the factory.
The arguments that were passed to the factory.
member.returns: The type that shall be created for the specified method and arguments.

member.name: M:Ninject.Extensions.Factory.StandardInstanceProvider.GetName(System.Reflection.MethodInfo,System.Object[])
member.summary: Gets the name that shall be used to request an instance for the specified method and arguments. Null if unnamed instances shall be requested.
member.param: The method info of the method that was called on the factory.
The arguments that were passed to the factory.
member.returns: The name that shall be used to request an instance for the specified method and arguments. Null if unnamed instances shall be requested.

member.summary: Gets the constructor arguments that shall be passed with the instance request.

The arguments that were passed to the factory.
member.returns: The constructor arguments that shall be passed with the instance request.

member.name: P:Ninject.Extensions.Factory.StandardInstanceProvider.Fallback
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether this instance falls back to requesting instances without name or constraint if none can be received otherwise.
member.value: true if this instance shall fall back to requesting instances without name or constraint if none can be received otherwise, otherwise false.

member.name: T:Ninject.Extensions.Factory.TypeMatchingArgumentInheritanceInstanceProvider
member.summary: The type matching implementation of the instance provider using constructor argument inheritance.

member.summary: Gets the constructor arguments that shall be passed with the instance request. Created constructor arguments are flagged as inherited and are of type TypeMatchingConstructorArgument
member.param: The method info of the method that was called on the factory.
The arguments that were passed to the factory.
member.returns: The constructor arguments that shall be passed with the instance request.

member.name: T:Ninject.Extensions.Factory.ArgumentPositionCalculator
member.summary: Calculates the position of method arguments

member.summary: Calculates the position of method arguments

member.name: M:Ninject.Extensions.Factory.IArgumentPositionCalculator.GetPositionOfFuncConstructorArgument(Ninject.Extensions.Factory.FuncConstructorArgument,Ninject.Activation.IContext,Ninject.Planning.Targets.ITarget)
member.summary: Gets the position of the specified relative to the other of the same type in the specified context.
member.param: The argument for which the position is calculated.
member.returns: -1 if the parameter does not exist in the context or if another constructor argument applies for the target. Otherwise the position of the specified within the other of the same type contained in context.Parameters.

member.name: M:Ninject.Extensions.Factory.IArgumentPositionCalculator.GetTargetPosition(Ninject.Activation.IContext,Ninject.Planning.Targets.ITarget)
member.summary: Gets the position of the parameter specified by the target relative to the other parameters of the same type of the method containing the target. Parameters that apply to other ConstructorArguments are ignored.
member.param: The target for which the position is calculated.
member.returns: -1 if the target is not found of the parameter applies to another constructor argument. Otherwise the position of the target relative to the other parameters of the method that have the same type and do not apply to another .

member.name: M:Ninject.Extensions.Factory.ArgumentPositionCalculator.GetPositionOfFuncConstructorArgument(Ninject.Extensions.Factory.FuncConstructorArgument,Ninject.Activation.IContext,Ninject.Planning.Targets.ITarget)

member.summary: Gets the position of the parameter specified by the target relative to the other parameters of the same type of the method containing the target. Parameters that apply to other ConstructorArguments are ignored.
member.param: The target for which the position is calculated.
member.returns: -1 if the target is not found of the parameter applies to another constructor argument. Otherwise the position of the target relative to the other parameters of the method that have the same type and do not apply to another .
